About Me

Hey! I'm Tia. 

Welcome to Tee Travels - your go to travel blog for authentic and unfiltered travel advice. 

With my in-depth and easy to follow travel guides and itineraries, along with my trusted travel resources, I will provide you with everything you need to plan the ultimate travel adventures. 

MY GOAL: to show you that no matter the odds you can make your travel dreams a reality.
